name: Labour Contractor / Service Provider Code of Conduct

fields.label: I hereby confirm that our organization complies with the following principles:
options: We do not use child labour
We do not use forced labour or any form of modern slavery
We support the right to freedom of association and collective bargaining
We ensure fair and safe working conditions
We do not discriminate in any form
We pay employees fairly, on time, and in line with legal requirements
We provide employees with adequate rest and working hours
We comply with all legal obligations and industry standards
We will submit to audits upon request by the client
We report any incidents or violations immediately
